content: **another addictive quick and cute pattern from crochet road ** **includes a full video tutorial ** these 4 round easter eggs can be made in around 10 minutes each once you get the hang of them enjoy this clear and easy to follow pattern including many photos *use these easter eggs for different creative purposes * * create a horizontal or vertical garland * add to children s easter baskets * create easter themed random acts of crochet kindness * make an easter wreath with these eggs as a feature * use as placeholders for easter celebrations * make with embroidery thread and create a pair of earrings * use as part of an easter egg hunt almost any yarn weight can be used for this project with corresponding hook size suggested hook sizes are given inside the pattern for 4 yarn weights from fingering up to bulky weight **finished size ** finished sizes for easter eggs made with 4 common yarn weights are given inside the pdf can t wait to see your creativity with this one please share your beautiful work on social media so that we can all be inspired lots of love joy xxx **find me here ** instagram - @crochetroad facebook - crochet road facebook group - crochet road community youtube - crochet road this pattern is an original crochet road design and is for personal use only it may not be copied shared translated published altered edited or distributed either online or offline you are free to sell items made from this pattern as long as they are made by yourself in a limited number please mention crochet road joy clements as designer in your product listings & on tags use your own photos to promote and sell your items thank you and have a wonderful day ©crochet road all rights reserved
